channel.title: Announcements
channel.description: My announcements that appear when you log in, like "Welcome to blah blah blah" in announcements.ini, appear twice in game. It's once in the announcements file, but twice in game.

item.title: Announcements
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Do you have all the strings set for the announcements.ini file?

Announcement1=
Announcement2=
Announcement3=

Set up to the amount the void is screening for?

Read full topic

source it on your comp and change l0l…
